oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SYNTHESIS OF A NOVEL ORGANO SELENIUM SULFUR HETEROCYCLE - DIBENZO-1,2,5-DITHIASELENEPINE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, HB
KUMAR, SK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: molecular superconductor
phase-transition
complexes
ligands
lithiation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ortho-Selenation of benzenethiol has been achieved by using the reagent n-butyl-lithium-tetramethylethylenediamine (TMEDA) and elemental selenium; reaction of cis-PdCl2(PPh3)2 with a solution of 1-lithioseleno-2-lithiothiobenzene gave the novel organoselenium heterocycle, dibenzo-1,2,5-dithiaselenepine.
